price: 40.Miyuusan Kaasi (Alle) awoodin inuu soo nooleeyo maytida? (Haayoo wuu Karaa).
arabic: أَلَيۡسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alaysa dhālika biqādirin ʿalā an yuḥ'yiya al-mawtā
